greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! I love coming to school and getting to play with you. <es name='affection_05' /> It makes me so happy that I want to dance! <es name='dance_flamenco_guitar_00' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> It's the robot that you selected last time </es>. We are ready to go to adventures together in the hills full of fruits this time!<es name='Emoji_Apple' />

all: <es cat='happy'> Okay, Today I'm going to make my favorite dish.</es> My favorite dish is an apple pie. But I don't have enough apples to make the pie. <es cat='sad' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different apples here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the hills.

robot_select: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! I love coming to school and getting to play with you. <es name='affection_05' /> It makes me so happy that I want to dance! <es name='dance_flamenco_guitar_00' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />   <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> You need to first select which robot you want to be</es> , so we can go to adventures together in the robot world. Pick a robot!

all: We found so many <prize-name>s. Yay! I can make a wonderful apple pie! <es name = 'affection_01'/> Thank you for helping me <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' /> I'm going to count the sheeps and go back to sleep. Bye for now, but see you again soon! <break size='1.0' /> bye.

question0: <es cat='question'> I wonder what makes the apples grow in different colors.</es>
question1: <es cat='confused'>I wonder why all the apples are round. Maybe there's an apple in the shape of a banana?</es>
question2: <es cat='question'>I'd like to know how many apples there are in the whole world!</es>
question3: <es cat='curious'>Hmm.. Shall I make the pie round? <break size='0.5'/>triangle? <break size='0.5'/>or square?</es>
question4: <es cat='question'>I wonder how many cakes I can make with all these apples? </es>
question5: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what's on the other side of the hill?</es>
question6: <es cat='question'> I wonder what makes the apples grow in different colors.</es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder what the sheep on the opposite hill is doing?</es>
